title: Laptop City
description: Laptop City is a laptop reselling website. It is a MERN project. I have used HTML,CSS, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase. Laptop city was about a refurbished Laptop reselling website.

title: Nikah Photography
description: Nikah photography is a personal service app for wedding photographers. It is a MERN Stack project. I have used HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase.

title: Epic Coding
description: Epic Coding is an online education platform . It is a MERN Stack project. I have used HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase.Users can select any of the courses from available courses.
